TopicTitle: Just 7 days til launch! Watch the first preview video of...

Articles.Content: When can we expect videos from the the media groups?
Really? Not only are they still skipping beta, but *rushing for release*? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

> 
> Really? Not only are they still skipping beta, but *rushing for release*? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

look at the CURRENT version, and say that again.

> 
> Really? Not only are they still skipping beta, but *rushing for release*? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Yeah, 0.90.0 is the first "Beta" version. You could say 1.0 will also be a "Beta" version, even though it is the release of the game. All it means is that KSP is at a "completed" state, where everything the devs planned has been added to the game.
Our current 'beta' isn't about testing anyway. Playtesting and bughunting is mostly done by Squads Experimental Team, and they do seem to have quite a bit more time than usual.
To much or not enough those testers have. Only Jeb will decide. =^.^=

> 
> When can we expect videos from the the media groups?

I would expect the end of this week - Friday or Saturday is my bet.

> 
> look at the CURRENT version, and say that again.

When I meant skipping beta, I meant that developers ought to have at least two updates before considering their game worthy of release.
Look on that girl's face is terrifying.

Kerbals can now parkour. Thats the first thing I noticed when I saw this. Ladders? Who needs that when you can climb up fuel tanks. Valentina, she GOTTA GO FAST! Faster than the male kerbals. I like this ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Holy crap, she looks totally psychotic.

Jeb's younger sister?

> 
> Holy crap, she looks totally psychotic.
> Jeb's younger sister?

Wait....Fanfics are started.
Female kerbals got a too big mouth and a small head ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Female kerbals got a too big mouth and a small head ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

There, I fixed that for you.

> 
> ? o\_o

You said that Female Kerbals' mouths are too big for their heads. I pointed out that in fact all Kerbals' mouths are too big for their head.

> 
> [http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/ttte/images/d/d1/TheAdventureBegins21.png/revision/latest?cb=20150112000914](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/ttte/images/d/d1/TheAdventureBegins21.png/revision/latest?cb=20150112000914)
> The only accurate way to express my emotions. Me being very happy whilst simultaneously having friends who couldn't give a crap. And also with trains in it. HypeTrain reaching SUPERLUDICROUS speeds!

![11192274_982265135147576_1702063503_n.gif](http://images.blu3wolf.com/uploads/11192274_982265135147576_1702063503_n.gif)
